labInfo.title: SPACIOUS LAB UNIVERSE
labInfo.content: In Unicup bubble teashop, you are the professionalist of making tea drinks. We provide a tea illustration program for all tea lovers.You could create your special tea drinks with the best materails we provided.

labInfo.title: UNIQUE TEA BASE
labInfo.content: We make our tea base with highly selective tea leaves from Tai Wan. Take a sip of our tea drink and you will experience each tea has its own determined aroma and taste.

labInfo.title: WE CARE YOUR NEEDS
labInfo.content: We are providing healthy tapioca which is made of various healthy nuts cereal powder. The tapioca is more healthy , tasty, and chewy!
